# Day 1168

![An LBH (Leveraged Bitcoin Home)](https://miro.medium.com/1*5HjtVSQ38H3_k17dW4zjvA.png)

**How to Put Your Home Equity to Work in Bitcoin Without Selling Your House**

As a Bitcoin maximalist, I've always believed Bitcoin is the future of money and the best savings technology ever invented. But like many homeowners, I've had one big frustration:

**All that home equity just... sitting there.**
Doing nothing.
While Bitcoin has gone on to change lives.

That's why Sovana's new _Bitcoin Investment Partnership (BIP)_ caught my eye and why I think it could become a major unlock for long-term Bitcoiners who are also property owners.

**The Problem: Part Of Your Wealth Is Trapped**

If you own a home, chances are a good chunk of your net worth is tied up in it. You've built equity, maybe hundreds of thousands of dollars. But tapping into it usually means:

- Taking out a HELOC (and making monthly payments with interest)

- Refinancing (and dealing with rates, fees, and loan bureaucracy)

- Or the nuclear option: selling your home (not happening)

Meanwhile, Bitcoin has been the best-performing asset of the last 15 years - and many of us have only been able to invest what we can spare from our paycheck.

**It looks like the free market might have found a better way: Sovana, A New Kind of Partnership**

Sovana flips the traditional model on its head. They don't offer a loan. There's no interest. No payments.

Instead, they fund a Bitcoin investment _on your behalf_ using their capital and your home equity serves as the basis for the partnership.

Here's how it works:

**âœ… No Monthly Payments, No Upfront Costs**

Sovana fronts the Bitcoin purchase for you. There's no loan application, no credit check, no debt. You're not repaying anything monthly.

This is not a mortgage or HELOC; it is a shared upside agreement.

**ðŸ’¸  Use Your Equity Without Touching Your Cash**

Your investment amount is based on your home's value minus any existing mortgage, up to 70% LTV.

So if your home is worth $500,000 and you owe $200,000, Sovana could fund up to $150,000 worth of Bitcoin, **without you pulling a dollar from your bank account.**

**ðŸ“ˆ  50/50 Profit Sharing**

When Bitcoin goes up, you keep 50% of the gains. Sovana takes the other 50% as their return.

If Bitcoin 10x's, you benefit just as much as they do.

**ðŸ•° ï¸ 10-Year Time Horizon, with Flexibility**

The partnership lasts a decade, which aligns perfectly with a long-term Bitcoin thesis. But if you need to exit earlier (like if you sell your house), you can with no penalties.

**ðŸ§  Leverage Without Liquidation Risk**

You gain Bitcoin exposure without selling other assets or triggering capital gains. Unlike margin trading, there are **no margin calls** even if Bitcoin dips.

**ðŸ“Š  Asymmetric Upside, Capped Downside**

Sovana splits the gains but shoulders all the investment risk. If Bitcoin drops, they take the hit, not you. Your risk is the home equity you commit.

**â³ Time Arbitrage for True Believers**

You're effectively borrowing against Bitcoin's future. If you believe it's heading to $250K, $500K, or beyond... this is a bet that aligns where most of people's wealth sits idle, in their home, with where Bitcoiners believe the world is headed: Mass Adoption.

**Let's Talk Risks: Because They're Real**

This isn't a free lunch. If Bitcoin declines over the 10-year term, the losses come out of your home equity. Sovana gets their investment back first, any shortfall hits your portion of the equity.

**So yes, this is a leveraged bet.**
 But so is holding cash during double-digit inflation.
 So is staying 100% in a fiat-denominated asset.

For me, the question is simple:

> _Do I believe Bitcoin will outperform dollars over the next decade?_

If the answer is yes, and I believe it is, then I want my wealth positioned accordingly.

**Who This Is For**

This model isn't for everyone. But it could be a perfect fit for:

- Long-term Bitcoin holders with significant home equity

- Homeowners who want to stack more sats, but lack liquid cash

- People seeking a **tax-efficient** way to increase Bitcoin exposure

- Anyone who wants to _activate_ their home equity without debt

- Stackers who want part of their Bitcoin held securely by a professional for 10 years reducing personal op-sec risks

**How to Get Started**

Sovana offers a prequalification tool on their site: [sovana.io](https://sovana.io). It shows you how much Bitcoin you could potentially invest based on your home value.

There's no obligation just information. They didn't pay me to write this, I wrote it because I'm considering the product for myself.

They're early-stage, but what they're building is bold, original, and deeply aligned with the ethos of Bitcoin: **turning stagnant capital into sovereignty.**

**Final Thoughts: Equity to Energy**

I've been in Bitcoin for years, but only recently became a homeowner.
Already, I feel the sting of watching my equity sit idle while Bitcoin keeps soaring.

Sovana gives that equity a mission.
It's a way to redirect dormant value into the strongest store of value we've ever known.

No banks. No interest. Just a partner putting up their capital to share in the upside - and the risk.

A decade-long bridge between your home and your conviction in Bitcoin.

Would you make that bet?
I'm genuinely curious what others think.

![I like how AI added a solar panel next to the Bitcoin house](https://miro.medium.com/1*Nx7SKLfDQhT0wmfYVmuHmQ.png)
